title: Set alias for columns in dataset but expression builder shows old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the assigned alias names.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset, the assigned alias names should be displayed for the columns. For example, when double-clicking on the first column name, the alias name should be shown instead of the original name.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select the dataset that has alias names assigned to its columns. 
3. Double-click on the first column name. 
4. Verify that the alias name is displayed instead of the original name in the expression builder.
